outputs.output_descr: Achieving the Integrated Framework Goal of expanding Sierra Leone’s participation in the global economy

Support to government management of the mineral sector for increased transparency, efficiency and equity.

UNDP supports Private Sector Development in Sierra Leone through an Advisory and Facilitation Function housed in the Office of the President and through an Investment Generation Function housed in the Office of the President
Support to the Government of Sierra Leone in implementing its Aid Policy (2009) to strengthen aid effectiveness

project_descr: INTEGRATED FRAMEWORK TOURISM PROJECT; Private sector Support Project; Aid Coordination Project
